EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
M/V FT ODIN, 13 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
ADRIFT IN 35-56.4N 022-53.0E AT 060515Z MAR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO JRCC PIRAEUS,
TELEX: 601211588, PHONE: 3021 0411 2500,
FAX: 3021 0413 2398.
